attributes.action: put a stop to the upset that benefits agencys put fibromyalgia sufferers though
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have enough to deal with there should be more help out there for us all not more hassle our gp's should be the ones to say if we get the benefits or not ,not people that have never met us please train them to be fibromyalgia aware i went through an appeal for dla benefit and ended up so ill after the awful ordeal that i couldnt get up for 3 days after
